BossAmountExceededException - Exception Class in business.exceptions
This exception is thrown when the amount of bosses in an encounter exceeds the maximum allowed.

BossesToAddExceededException - Exception Class in business.exceptions
This exception is thrown when the number of bosses to add to an encounter exceeds the maximum allowed.

Constructs a new BossesToAddExceededException with the specified detail message.
